actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare (Subsequently: Human Resources)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare (Subsequently: Human Resources).

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act in order to require that the label of certain drugs include expiration dates regarding the effectiveness or potency of such drugs.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require the labeling of certain drugs, whose safety, effectiveness, or potency becomes diminished after storage, with the date beyond which the drug should not be used.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act in order to require that the label of certain drugs include expiration dates regarding the effectiveness or potency of such drugs.
